pkgmetadata.longdescription: Wavelet Scalogram Tools for Time Series Analysis // Provides scalogram based wavelet tools for time series analysis: wavelet power spectrum, scalogram, windowed scalogram, windowed scalogram difference (see Bolos et al. (2017) doi:10.1016/j.amc.2017.05.046), scale index and windowed scale index (Benitez et al. (2010) doi:10.1016/j.camwa.2010.05.010).
